**Income inequality dipped and fewer people moved, according to largest survey of US life**
The U.S. Census Bureau’s American Community Survey shows that from 2023 to 2024 income inequality fell by nearly 0.5 percentage points nationwide, with median household income rising from $80,002 to $81,604. Marriage rates declined: men who have never married grew from 37.2 % to 37.6 %, and women from 31.6 % to 32.1 %.
